comments_since_last_sample.body:
Thanks for your vids. You have brought an extra dimension to my life. 
I was at home listening to Dvořák for the first time yesterday. Now I have some more new pieces to explore. Cheers
I feel like nocturnes op. 48 no 1 by Chopin doesn’t get enough love. It’s heartbreakingly beautiful
OOH Debussy ! I love Debussy !! Sometimes all I think about is Debussy
Sonata for viola and piano op.11 no.4 by Hindemith and all of his sonatas could  be on this list.
Schoenberg notturno for harp and strings @TwoSetViolin
Check out Arvo Pärt Spiegel im spiegel.
The 10th piece should be Moritz Moszkowski – Piano Concerto №2 in E major

What I would give to be as good a violin player as twoset...

me commenting this on a video where they're not playing lol :)
Twoset........u need to check out Respighi's music, especially his il pini del gianicolo from his pines of rome, my favouritestest piece of classical ( late romantic 😁😁😁😁 ) piece EVER!!!!!!
OMG that movement of Mahler 4 is my favorite thing ever! ❤️❤️❤️
yes like this more than several others
